results:
Based on the search results, I can provide you with information about Dune (2021)'s box office performance and Rotten Tomatoes score:

## Box Office Performance

Dune opened to $40 million at the North American box office during its opening weekend in October 2021. The film crossed $300 million at the global box office by early November 2021, though I don't see the specific $434 million figure mentioned in these results.

The film had a strong international performance before its U.S. release:
- It earned over $100 million at the international box office before hitting American theaters
- Warner Bros/Legendary's Dune harvested $36.8M at the international box office from just 24 markets in early release

## Rotten Tomatoes Score

Critics have been very favorable to it with an 83% on the Tomatometer, and it has an 83% on Rotten Tomatoes and notched an "A-" CinemaScore. Another source mentions Dune is now 90% Fresh on Rotten Tomatoes.

The film was well-received critically and performed solidly at the box office despite the challenging pandemic conditions and its simultaneous release on HBO Max. The film earned a Certified Fresh rating on Rotten Tomatoes and was successful enough to greenlight the sequel, Dune: Part Two.
